price: 20. Ama namma buttak addunya faxxa buttaa (koros kinnuk) kee akeera faxxa buttak (mominiin kinnuk) kulli buttah ninni rizqhi keenih naceeh keenik manargiqa addunyal, Nabiyow rizqhi ku Rabbik acwaay muxxo kinni, Nabiyow ku Rabbih mattaccoo numuk waaso mali.
arabic: كُلّٗا نُّمِدُّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مِنۡ عَطَآءِ رَبِّكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ عَطَآءُ رَبِّكَ مَحۡظُورًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kullan numiddu hāulāi wahāulāi min ʿaṭāi rabbika wamā kāna ʿaṭāu rabbika maḥẓūran
